mapper.select: SELECT *, substring(report_date, 1, 4) AS yeah, substring(report_date, 6, 2) AS month, substring(report_date, 9, 2) AS day FROM hdg_battery_report_date WHERE battery_id = #{batteryId} order by report_date desc
SELECT * FROM hdg_battery_report_date WHERE battery_id = #{batteryId} order by report_date desc limit 1
SELECT DISTINCT y.* FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(report_date, '%Y') AS yeah FROM hdg_battery_report_date WHERE battery_id = #{batteryId} ORDER BY report_date DESC ) AS y
select distinct DATE_FORMAT(report_date,'%Y') as yeah , DATE_FORMAT(report_date,'%m') as month from hdg_battery_report_date where battery_id = #{batteryId}
